endpoints.query: Do you have GitLab file operation tools? Please help me create or update file path/to/file.txt in project ID 123 on branch dev, content is "Hello World", commit message is "Update file content".

endpoints.summary: Push files to a specific branch
endpoints.Hierarchical_information: The gitlab_mcp for the file_systems is as follows: Push files to a specific branch
endpoints.query: Do you have GitLab file operation tools? I want to push two files to project ID 456 on branch master, one is src/main.py with content print('hello'), another is README.md with content project description, commit message is "Submit new code".

endpoints.summary: Search code repositories
endpoints.Hierarchical_information: The gitlab_mcp for the file_systems is as follows: Search code repositories
endpoints.query: Do you have GitLab file operation tools? Please help me search code repositories containing keyword "fastapi", first page, 20 items per page.

endpoints.summary: Create a new code repository
endpoints.Hierarchical_information: The gitlab_mcp for the file_systems is as follows: Create a new code repository
endpoints.query: Do you have GitLab file operation tools? Help me create a new code repository named "my-new-project", description is "This is a test repository", repository permission set to public, and initialize README file.
